summary: Diff implements a new SHQ-style global palette (OKLCH CSS variables), adds a navy gradient background utility, updates app shell (App/Dashboard/Header/Footer/Login/Profile Setup) to use the new theme, and introduces a centered translucent “pill” top tab navigation component. However, the new top nav changes tab labels away from the existing names, and the diff includes multiple non-requested functional enhancements across several feature tabs/hooks beyond the visual/layout scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep the existing set of tabs and navigation behavior unchanged (including existing tab names/labels and admin-only Users tab).
missing_requirements.reason: The new pill navigation changes tab labels from the existing names (e.g., “Reports”/“Users”) to different labels, which violates the requirement to keep existing tab names/behavior unchanged.

hallucinated_features.description: Program/Reports/KPI/Team feature changes beyond visual/layout (e.g., report export to PDF/Excel, priority sorting, new filters, new drawers, CRUD/validation workflow changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits scope to theme/layout changes and lists non-goals that exclude modifying program/team/KPI/calendar/report logic; the diff summary indicates substantial functional enhancements in multiple components.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query hook expansion for unique divisions and changed toast messaging / cache invalidation behaviors.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-72/73/74 and appears to modify application logic/behavior rather than only styling/layout.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer adds caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any requirement; introduces new outbound link/tracking behavior.
